name: # Accelerated Shields
desc: Increases the turn rate of the ship's shields by %s and the rate at which the shields are raised by %s.
short: Increases shield turn rate and extension speed.
sModDesc: Increases the shield's turn rate and raise rate by an additional %s.

name: Collapsed Fleet Gantry
desc:
Dedicated onboard gantry and fleet servicing facility collapsed due to damages and able to provide only limited range of logistical bonuses for ship's fleet.

Provide %s supply use per month reduction bonus and %s recovery and DP reduction bonus to all ships member of the fleets. 

Its vast bulk and hangar consumed by hastly repairs and makeshift supports making it unable to maintain and store frigates inside.

its dedicated fleetwide drive field stabilizer lies uncallibrated and underpowered unable to provide any effect to ship's fleet.
short: Provide supply use, DP, after combat supplies recovery and max burn bonust to all ships within the fleets

name: Remove Some Decks
desc: [Hidden Everywhere] Remove some of flight decks (4).
short: [Hidden Everywhere] Remove some of flight decks (4).

name: Unstable Shield
desc: Long exposure to elements and deep damage had adverce and not easily repaired damade to shield's power supply. While emitar itself seems to be stable power fluctuation force unpredictable behaviour of shield in combat.

name: Voidfaring Hubship Command
desc:
Comprehensive overhaul to basic operation center designed to coordinate crew on big capital ship and provide captain with best fleetwide communications.

Increases the command point recovery rate by %s when installed on the flagship.

When deployed in combat, grants %s ECM rating and reduces the weapon range reduction due to enemy ECM by %s.

Coorinates wings on ship's modules to prioritize targeting main hull's target. This effect work even if core hull don't have fighter bays but Don't forget to press engage button (default Z)!!!
short: Increases command point recovery rate when on flagship, reduces effects of enemy ECM on range, provide ECM rating and coorinates module's wings.

name: Left module converted to Carrier
desc: Debuff for having more wings on modules: Affects cargo, fuel and DP with supplies/deployment
short: Debuff for having more wings on modules

name: Right module converted to Cargo
desc: Buff for removing wings on modules: Affects cargo, fuel and DP with supplies/deployment
short: Buff for removing wings on modules

name: Converted to Carrier
desc: [Hidden Everywhere] Convert Left module to carrier by adding wing slots and swaping sprite.
short: [Hidden Everywhere] Convert Left module to carrier by adding wing slots and swaping sprite.

name: Converted to Cargo
desc: [Hidden Everywhere] Convert Right module to cargo by removing wing slots and swaping sprite.
short: [Hidden Everywhere] Convert Right module to cargo by removing wing slots and swaping sprite.
